price: 190. (Pourtant), lorsqu’il leur eut accordé un (enfant) sain, ils Lui associèrent (des émules) pour ce qu’Il leur avait accordé. Mais Allah est au-dessus de ce qu’ils Lui associaient.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhumā ṣāliḥan jaʿalā lahu shurakāa fīmā ātāhumā fataʿālā al-lahu ʿammā yush'rikūna
